coupon.sys.services

Class AdminWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.services.AdminWebService

  • @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RestController
public class AdminWebService
extends java.lang.Object
    The Web Service class manages all the requests sent by the admin client
    Author:
    Yehuda.Hizmi

    • Method Detail

      • createCompany

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/create-company",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> createCompany(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Company company,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the create company method at the Admin Facade class. The method adds a new company to the DB
        Parameters:
        company - - the company to be added to the DB (sent from the client side via JSON Object)
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Admin Facade

                method=DELETE,
                consumes="application/json")

        company - - the company to be deleted from to the DB (sent from the client side via JSON Object)

      • getCompany

        @RequestMapping(value="/company/get-company/{comp_id}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCompany(@PathVariable(value="comp_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 long comp_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This web service activates the get company method at the Admin Facade class. The method returns a company from the DB
        Parameters:
        comp_id - - the id of the requested company
        Returns:
        - the company that matches the id
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - the exception that was thrown from the Admin Facade
